item.name: Health & Monitoring

request.description: Returns basic health status of the StyleSync API application. This endpoint provides a quick way to verify the application is running and responsive.
Checks the database connection status and returns connection information. This endpoint verifies that the application can successfully connect to and query the PostgreSQL database.
Returns comprehensive health information including application details, database status, and system metrics. This endpoint provides detailed diagnostics for monitoring and troubleshooting.

item.description: Application and system health check endpoints

request.description: Customer-scoped registration for Acme. Creates a new user or links an existing user to the Acme customer.

exec: console.log('User now linked to customers:', json.data.customers.map(c => c.urlSlug).join(', '));

request.description: Customer-scoped registration for Elite Cuts. If the email already exists, this links the user to Elite Cuts and updates their profile.
Admin endpoint. Retrieves a list of all countries with their address format configurations.
Admin endpoint. Retrieves country information and address format rules by ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code.
Admin endpoint. Retrieves country information by its unique ID.
Admin endpoint. Updates country information and address format configuration.
Admin endpoint. Deletes a country from the system. Only possible if the country has no associated branches.

item.name: Multi-Tenant Authentication

request.description: Retrieve all customers the authenticated user has access to. Returns customer summaries with id, name, urlSlug, and logoUrl.
Validate customer context and retrieve customer information. Used for URL-based customer recognition in /salon/{customer-slug} routes.

response.name: Conflict Response

request.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific professional by its ID. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can access this endpoint.

request.description: Retrieves all active services available at a specific branch with their pricing information. This is the service menu for a branch.

Removes pricing for a service at a specific branch. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è

item.name: Bookings Management

request.description: Retrieves all bookings across all customers. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è Only ADMIN users can access this endpoint.

response.name: Conflict Response (Double Booking)

exec: console.log('Customer booking created, ID saved:', json.data.id);

request.description: Creates a new booking for the current customer. Customer ID and User ID are automatically determined from context. Set professionalId to null for auto-assignment.
Retrieves all bookings for the current customer. ‚ö†Ô∏è ADMIN/STAFF ROLE REQUIRED ‚ö†Ô∏è
Retrieves all bookings for the authenticated user within the customer context. Available to all authenticated users.
Retrieves a specific booking within the customer context.
Updates a booking within the customer context (reschedule, etc.).
Cancels a booking within the customer context (sets status to CANCELLED).

item.description: Customer-scoped booking management (ADMIN/STAFF: Full access, CLIENT: Own bookings only)

item.name: Availability

request.description: üåê PUBLIC ENDPOINT - No authentication required. Returns available time slots for a service at a branch on a specific date. Omit professionalId to see aggregated availability across all professionals.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: üåê PUBLIC ENDPOINT - No authentication required. Retrieves booking details using a confirmation token. Used for the booking confirmation page that users access via email link.
üåê PUBLIC ENDPOINT - No authentication required. Confirms a booking using the confirmation token sent via email. Changes booking status from PENDING to CONFIRMED.
üåê PUBLIC ENDPOINT - No authentication required. Cancels a booking using the confirmation token. Can be used from the confirmation email if the user wants to cancel instead of confirm.

item.description: Public availability checking for booking interface (no authentication required)
Complete booking management with admin, customer-scoped operations, and public availability checking
